name: 楊侑倫
objective:
本課程涉及金屬材料在受到靜態或動態負載下之彈性和塑性變形。課程內容涵蓋材料科學、熱處理、差排塑性理論、強化機制、及材料結構與機械性質的關係。材料在超過降伏點、疲勞、潛變、及其他失效與破壞機制亦會討論。

This course introduces material's elastic and plastic response under static and dynamic loads. The content of this course includes Material science, heat treatment, dislocation plasticity, and strengthening mechanisms of materials. Material's failure mechanisms including yielding, fracture, fatigue, creep, and others will also be discussed.
schedule:
課程簡介 (第一週)
第一章 材料結構與變形機制(第二至三週)
第二章 工程材料簡介(第四至五週)
第三章 機械測試方法(第六至第七週)
-------期中考--------(第八週)
第四章  應力應變關係(第九至十一週)
第五章  破壞力學(第十二至十三週)
第六章  塑性力學(第十四至十六週)
-------期末考--------(第十七週)

Introduction (week 1)
1. Structure and Deformation in Materials (week 2-3)
2. A Survey of Engineering Materials (week 4-5)
3. Mechanical Testing methods (week 6-7)
-------Mid-term Exam------- (week 8)
4. Stress-strain relationships (week  9-11)
5. Fracture mechanics (week 12-13)
6. Theory of plasticity (week 14-16)
-------Final Exam------- (week 17)
